title: Image Vital C Hydrating Enzyme Masque 2OZ
description: Gently exfoliates dead skin with enzymes and adds essential anti-oxidants and minerals to improve skin health. Ideal for all skin types and rosacea.

title: Image Skin care Ageless Total Skin Lightening Serum 1 oz
description: A natural skin lightening serum desugned to diminish brown spots and redness associated with rosacea, post peal, and post surgery and sunburned skin. Directions: use morning and evening for best resultsrnSkin type: sun ddamaged skin, rosacea,aging.

title: Image Skin Care Ageless Total Resurfacing Masque 2 oz
description:
An exfoliating blend of Glycolic and Salicylic acids resurface the skin, gently sloughing off dead cells. A lightening blend diminishes brown spots. This is truly a home mini-peel! Apply 1-3 times per week for glowing skin. Great for all skin types.
DIRECTIONS

After cleansing apply a thin coat to entire face, neck and hands. Leave on for 5 to 30 minutes. Massage for 1 minute and rinse with cool water. It can also be used as a blemish spot treatment overnight. Use 1 to 3 times per week.
SKIN TYPE INDICATIONS

    Aging
    Oily/Acne
    Sun damaged

	
BENEFITS

    Triple-action exfoliator gently sloughs dull surface skin with micro crystals
    Reduces excess oil and evens skin tone
    Skin lightening properties

  	 
DAILY APPLICATION
Evening - 1 to 3 times per week or mix with Image cleansers for extra exfoliation.

title: OPI Nail Polish France Collection Color Tickle My France-Y F16 0.5oz 15ml
description: OPI is renowned globally for its Nail Lacquers - a brilliant, chip-resistant, professional formula available in over 200 fashion-forward colors. With clever names that customers look forward to with each new Collection, OPI Nail Lacquers are beloved around the world, and trusted by professionals. Neither OPI Nail Lacquers nor any other OPI product or service is subject to animal testing.

title: MDSolarSciences Mineral Tinted Creme SPF 30 1.7 oz.
description: MDSolarSciences Mineral Tinted Creme SPF 30 (formerly Mineral Sunscreen Tinted Gel SPF 30+) provides long-lasting, broad-spectrum protection to combat harmful UVA and UVB damage. The non-greasy formula features micronized titanium and zinc to form a barrier between environmental aggressors and your skin without clogging pores. Its water-resistant tint provides natural-looking coverage with a matte finish on all skin types and tones making it ideal for concealing imperfections.

title: Image Ageless Total Eye Lift Creme, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Potent antioxidants, peptides, derivative of retinol combine to diminish fine lines and wrinkles in this lifting eye creme.

title: Image Skincare Total Facial Cleanser, 6 Fl Oz
description: A universal foaming cleanser that rinses away makeup and oil. Balances the PH of your skin and eliminates the need for a toner. A gentle Glycolic Acid blend begins the exfoliating process to reveal smoother skin. Ideal for all skin types.

title: REVLON Photoready Color Correcting Primer, 0.91 Fluid Ounce
description: REVLON photoready perfecting prime is a revolutionary, lightweight primer that helps soften skin and diffuses light to help minimize flaws and even out skin texture. It creates a perfect canvas so that your foundation will glide on more evenly and smoothly. Can be worn alone or under foundation.

title: Creative Nail Creative Nail Design Vinylux Nail Lacquer, Rock Royalty, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Vinylux weekly polish and weekly top coat are a system that is uniquely design to work together. Patent-pending pro-light technology creates a powerful network of cross-linked polymer bonds that build resistance to chips, and enhance durability with exposure to natural light over time.

title: Image Vital C Hydrating A C & E Serum .5oz
description: Potent anti-oxidants stimulate cellular turnover, protect against free radical damage and nourish
